Kim Il Sung's work published in Cuba 
    Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's famous work "Let us accomplish the cause of socialism and communism under the revolutionary banner of Juche" was brought out in booklet by the publishing house of the Cuban book association on March 20.
 In its preface the book says that on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung the publishing house has the pleasure to bring out his work in token of support to the Korean people in their efforts to boost the relations of friendship and solidarity between the two countries, build a developed socialist society and achieve national reunification in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and the South Korean reactionary forces.
